title: Minor Threat font ID
content:
Looking for the font used for 'Minor Threat'. Could be by hand, but if you know of anything similar, I'm aaalll ears. Thanks in advanced.

[http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/2/2c/Minor\_Threat\_-\_Out\_of\_Step...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031101306/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/2/2c/Minor_Threat_-_Out_of_Step.jpg "http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/2/2c/Minor\_Threat\_-\_Out\_of\_Step.jpg")
author: markmont

comments.content: It looks like a stretched/modified **[Flyerfonts Filler](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031101306/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=House-Industries&ffam=&fid=b3af4024c90f9e767781867a4017a20c&fsize=48&text=MINOR%20THREAT&fit=1)** by House Industries

The logo was created by their drummer and graphic designer Jeff Nelson. It was done by hand, but there are fonts patterned after the logo.  
 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeff\_Nelson\_%28musician%29](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031101306/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeff_Nelson_%28musician%29)
